text:
Having stayed in touch on- and-off over the years since their shock split in 2005, the couple have taken their friendship to a new level following the actor’s break-up with Angelina Jolie in 2016 – and Brad’s camp are officially confirming reports of a reconciliation with Jen.

‘[Brad and Jen] have connected and are in fact in touch,’ a source close to Brad told Gossip Cop, describing the initial reaching out as ‘friendly communications’.

Now, with reports claiming Brad’s divorce to Angelina is on the verge of being finalised, insiders tell New Idea it is all systems go for Brad, 54, and Jen, 49, to move forward – with insiders tipping the former couple will choose the Oscars for their big reveal.
title: Brad and Jen’s big announcement: ‘We’re in love again’
